name: Thomas Was Alone
overview: Thomas Was Alone, and then, well, he wasn't. Thomas Was Alone is the award winning, critically acclaimed platformer about friendship and jumping and floating and anti-gravity. Guide a group of sentient rectangles through a series of obstacles, combining their skills to reach the end of each level. Discover the story of the world's first sentient AIs, and how they worked together to, well not escape "escape" is a strong word. Perhaps "emerge" might be better. "Emerge" has an air of importance about it, while keeping the various plot twists and origin stories you'll discover under wraps. We didn't even mention the bouncing. That would be overkill.
